org.gvsig.raster.georeferencing.swing.impl.view

Class BaseViewPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.gvsig.raster.georeferencing.swing.impl.view.BaseViewPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, GeoreferencingView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ViewPanelImpl, ZoomPanelImpl

    public abstract class BaseViewPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements GeoreferencingView
    Clase de la que heredan los dialogos de vista y zoom que utilizan el ViewControl. Contiene métodos generales para el acceso a información del control.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
